Introduction¶

Welcome rpVisualiser’s documentation. This tool provides a docker wrapper for the rpVisualiser project.

docker build -t brsynth/rpvisualiser-standalone:v2 .

You can run the docker using the following command:

python run.py -input /path/to/file -input_format tar -output /path/to/file

API¶

class run.main(inputfile, input_format, output)¶

Docker call of the rpVisualiser project

Parameters

  • inputfile (str) – The path to the input file

  • input_format (str) – The input file format. Valid options: tar, sbml

  • output (str) – The path to the output file

Return type

None

Returns

None

rpVisualiser
